alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHWESTERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springfield, or 9 miles southwest of Hammond, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ponchatoula, Springfield, and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 30 and 31. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 25 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
